description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In Diamond Caves you just have to collect enough Emeralds and Diamonds and then reach the exit in time. Sounds easy? Then watch out for Bugs and Spaceships, Bombs and Dynamite, Keys and Doors, Acid Pools, Teleporters, Conveyor Belts and much more obstacles to conquer. You can play this game alone or in cooperative teamwork mode!
